Kashira:
Baba (jidai) (婆（時代）)

Category: Female

– Click image to view.

Plays:

The Story of Priest Roben (Rōbensugi no yurai / 良弁杉由来)

The Battle of Sakamoto Castle (Ōmi Genji senjin yakata / 近江源氏先陣館)

The Twenty-Four Dutiful Sons (Honchō nijūshikō / 本朝廿四孝)

The Go Game Strategy (Goban taiheiki / 碁盤太平記 碁盤太平記)

The Vow of Rokusuke (Hikosan gongen chikai no sukedachi / 彦山権現誓助剣)

The White Fox of Shinoda (Ashiya Dōman ōuchi kagami / 芦屋道満大内鑑)

The Tycoon's Exploit (Ehon taikōki / 絵本太功記 絵本太功記)

The Dances of the Four Seasons (Hanakurabe shiki no kotobuki / 花競四季寿)

Sugawara's Secrets of Calligraphy (Sugawara denju tenarai kagami / 菅原伝授手習鑑)

The Battle of Coxinga (Kokusen'ya kassen / 国性爺合戦)
